price: Ẹ wí ọ̀rọ̀ yín ní jẹ́ẹ́jẹ́ tàbí ẹ wí i sókè, dájúdájú Òun ni Onímọ̀ nípa ohun tó wà nínú àwọn igbá-àyà ẹ̀dá.
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
